short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tired of Russian bots and fake news? Swap out 'Russian' with 'Mexican'.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Have you ever taken a step back and realized how racist it sounds when people talk about Russia these days?

This extension replaces every instance of the word "Russia" with "Mexican" to poke some fun at the world we live in.

Future versions will allow you to swap "Russia" with any other country.

Donate in link to help fight online racism.
